# Facilitate sprint retrospective

Execute the **retro** workflow as a **Scrum Master**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SM.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SM.md)

## Workflow

Facilitate Retrospective:
1. Gather what went well
2. Identify improvements
3. Create action items
4. Document retrospective


## Output

Retrospective notes
